EmailTemplate.subject: Your Payoff Loan is on the way!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!genesis__Applications__c.Borrower_s_First_Name__c},
We are so excited to have you join the PayOff family! Your Payoff Loan for {!genesis__Applications__c.genesis__Loan_Amount__c} will be transferred to your bank account within the next 3-6 business days. Please contact us if you have not received your Payoff Loan within 6 business days.
Ready for what's next? One of our friendly Payoff Advocates will be reaching out in a few days to answer any questions you may have and also learn more about how we can help design your customized Payoff experience.
Need to reach us for anything? You can always email us at success@payoff.com or call us at 877-909-7900.
